name: Etherym Sacred Paradise
text: When this card is activated: you can add 1 Etherym monster from your deck to your hand. You can only use the following effects of "Etherym Sacred Paradise" once per turn. You can send 1 card in your hand to the GY; special summon 1 of your banished Etherym monsters. You can banish 2 monsters from your GY: (quick effect) this card is unaffected by effects your opponent controls until end of turn.
